get.description:
Returns a paginated collection of appointments. Useful for building
lists, tables, or infinite scrolls on the client.
get.summary: List paginated appointments ordered by most recent

path.description: Base path for paginator generated URLs.

per_page.description: Number of items shown per page.

to.description: Number of the last item in the slice.

total.description: Total number of items being paginated.

post.description:
Accepts validated appointment data and creates a new appointment
record. Returns the created resource.

get.description: Returns the appointment resource for the provided identifier.
get.summary: Get a single appointment by ID

put.description:
Applies the provided validated data to the specified appointment
and returns the updated resource.

delete.description:
Permanently removes the specified appointment and returns an empty
204 No Content response on success.

get.description:
Returns a paginated collection of health professionals for use in
lists, tables, or infinite scrolling UIs.
get.summary: List paginated health professionals ordered by most recent

path.description: Base path for paginator generated URLs.

per_page.description: Number of items shown per page.

to.description: Number of the last item in the slice.

total.description: Total number of items being paginated.

post.description:
Accepts validated data and creates a new health professional record.
Returns the created resource.

get.description: Returns the health professional resource for the provided identifier.
get.summary: Get a single health professional by ID

put.description:
Applies validated changes to the specified health professional and
returns the updated resource.

delete.description:
Permanently removes the specified health professional and returns a
204 No Content response on success.

get.description:
Returns a paginated collection of services suitable for lists,
tables, or infinite scroll views.
get.summary: List paginated services ordered by most recent

path.description: Base path for paginator generated URLs.

per_page.description: Number of items shown per page.

to.description: Number of the last item in the slice.

total.description: Total number of items being paginated.

post.description:
Accepts validated data and creates a new service record. Returns
the created resource.

get.description: Returns the service resource for the provided identifier.
get.summary: Get a single service by ID

put.description:
Applies validated changes to the specified service and returns the
updated resource.

delete.description:
Permanently removes the specified service and returns a 204 No
Content response on success.

errors.description: A detailed description of each field that failed validation.
